meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of albinism.
meanings.sent1: The albinotic skin was very sensitive to sunlight.
meanings.sent2: Her albinotic hair stood out in the crowd.
meanings.sent3: The albinotic rabbit wore sunglasses to protect its eyes.
meanings.sent4: The albinotic landscape was blanketed in a white, snowy glow.
meanings.sent5: The albinotic flowers in the garden seemed to shimmer in the moonlight.

meanings.sent1: The albinotic cat had striking red eyes.
meanings.sent2: The albinotic bird's feathers were pure white.
meanings.sent3: The albinotic squirrel was the talk of the forest.
meanings.sent4: The albinotic clouds drifted lazily across the sky.
meanings.sent5: The albinotic mountain peak gleamed in the morning sun.

meanings.sent1: The albinotic flowers lacked pigment in their petals.
meanings.sent2: The albinotic fish swam gracefully in the clear water.
meanings.sent3: The albinotic butterfly fluttered by, catching everyone's eye.
meanings.sent4: The albinotic deer blended into the snowy forest.
meanings.sent5: The albinotic seashells sparkled on the sandy beach.
